short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to apply custom CSS and Scripts to websites to help development and trouble shooting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Style Shifter empowers users to personalise the appearance and functionality of any website. With an easy-to-use interface, you can inject custom CSS to modify styles and adjust the layout of pages, as well as run custom JavaScript for added functionality. Whether youâ€™re a developer looking to experiment or someone who wants more control over how websites display, Style Shifter gives you the tools to modify websites in real-time.
